author: buffalonews
title: Area bowling 2
text:
Area bowling
AIRPORT: Local 1173 Retirees — Clarence Montgomery 268.
BRIERWOOD: Bob Binns Memorial — Geoff Nowak 288-709, Kevin Egan 702, Pete Cambio 693, Mike Demler 299, Ray Latona 270. Beer Guzzlers — Frank Markott 695, Jack Vogl 289-685, Charlie Brooks 257, Jack Reekie 256.
CLASSIC: Major B — Shawn Bender 268-725, Steve Simonds 719, Kevin Zitzka 269-698, Amanda Zastrow 256.
TRANSIT: Bowlers Choice 4 Man — Bill Cratsenberg 286-769, Josh Weatherall 300-763, Dave Monte 263-741, Ron Stacy 269-737, Jason Ciliberto 258-727, Kristina Szczerbinski 243-233-235-711, Sue Nawojski 243-661, Carrie Rascumberger 234-660, Peggy Kuhn 233-641, Sue Schottke 234-634. Storm/Bowlers Choice Seniors — Tim Newman 266-747, Ken Ball 255-738, Glen Hauptman 705, John Lagree 267-700, Joe Trigilio 290-696, Shootout: John Danielwicz (213) def. Joe Jack (202) and Ken Ball (201).
